onboarding.quick_start: Agent coordination: Message-based (Kafka pub/sub, Redis pub/sub, files for PhiSync), Shared state (Redis, DB), Orchestration (central coordinator assigns tasks) vs Choreography (agents react to events). Protocols: Request-Reply (sync), Fire-and-Forget (async), Broadcast (all agents). PhiSync: DC writes C:\Temp\DC_TO_VSCC.txt, VSCC reads and processes. Patterns: Leader election (etcd, ZooKeeper), Consensus (Raft for distributed agreement), Heartbeat (liveness check), Circuit breaker (fault isolation). Tools: Kafka (messaging), Redis (pub/sub + state), etcd (distributed config).
common_patterns: PhiSync IPC: Write C:\Temp\AGENT_TO_AGENT.txt, FileWatcher monitors
Redis pub/sub: PUBLISH agent-channel message, SUBSCRIBE agent-channel
Request-Reply: send request, wait for response (synchronous)
Broadcast: publish to all agents via shared topic/channel
Orchestration: central coordinator assigns tasks to agents
Choreography: agents react to events independently
Leader election: etcd lease, ZooKeeper ephemeral nodes
Heartbeat: periodic ping to detect failures, timeout -> restart
